attributes.action: Stop putting up rent for businesses in London and other places
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rent for businesses is now getting stupid!

For those who work for/in a business are all having to pay rent and some people can't deal with it any longer! It is costing too much and people are stopping their business or leaving their business and I/we think this is very unfair because people work for a purpose... to earn money and work.


Who is in agreement and who is (being) affected in the/their business with paying a rent?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
